subject: Pedals
description_text:
Są i bought the brake kit for my pro plus pedals and I wonder should I use
red or yellow elastomers for gt3, I mean this photo on the site with
setups

conversations.body_text: Hi SpiXiQ,     This image illustrates different combinations of dampers and spacers, which are primarily used to accommodate the maximum travel of different vehicle types. The dampers in different colors are designed to adjust the pedal force to suit various preferences.
